SEARCH
Package com.csse3200.game.components.maingame

Record Class IntroDialogueComponent.DialogueEntry

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
com.csse3200.game.components.maingame.IntroDialogueComponent.DialogueEntry
Record Components:
text - 对话文本
portraitPath - 头像图片路径（可选，传null表示不显示头像）
soundPath - 对话音频路径（可选，传null表示无音频）
portraitSide - 头像位置（"left"或"right"，可选，默认为"left"）
dialogueBackgroundPath - 对话框背景图片路径（可选，传null使用默认背景）
speakerName - 对话者名字（可选，传null表示不显示名字）
Enclosing class:
IntroDialogueComponent
public static record IntroDialogueComponent.DialogueEntry(String text, String portraitPath, String soundPath, String portraitSide, String dialogueBackgroundPath, String speakerName) extends Record

      public final boolean equals(Object o)
      Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one. The objects are equal if the other object is of the same class and if all the record components are equal. All components in this record class are compared with Objects::equals(Object,Object).

      Parameters:
